<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the difficult lives of princes and rulers; who are</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">to whom the conduct of government is contracted. He</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the Essays are the sediment of the <del>high</del> talk at</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">high tables; <del>when the</del> the common people are</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">contemptible, their diversions toys. The proper</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><del>subject</del> topic for rulers is the conduct of</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">affairs: where to [yield?]; how to steer; how to</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">placate, how to coax; how to control. <del>He</del> <add>To</add> the</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">aristocrat the play at the Globe or the Rose was</l>

<del xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">
            <l>a mere diversion, a rhapsody; something to</l>
            <l>amuse the common people, but outside the pale of</l>
            <l>ridicule; a diversion, <del>the</del> <del>best</del> to be vilified, as a</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">the close <del>[complaint?]</del> reflections, that darted into his head,</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">pass through [illeg.] channels, & if the in crabbed</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">him in. <del>There is none of the</del> The soul is</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">shut in; not, as in the other common Essays, free:</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"><rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-mmon" key="Montaigne, Michel de">Montaigne</rs>, by comparison, is free, <del>of every</del></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">rambling, <del>live</del> [unjust?], a vagabond, a ranger.</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">stage than this absorbed, [autoeratic?] [region?]</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">Pacing his groves, jotting his experience into</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">close packed sentences. The wild <del>[attitudes?]</del> as</l>

            <l>And yet, in <del>it</del> <del>the thought of the [illeg.], the</del></l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">was there not even in the grave &</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">subtle rulers a child? <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-eliz" key="Elizabeth I">The Queen</rs></l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">[surveyed?] plays as a "solace." The</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">had their need of farce, of hyperbole.</l>
